item.title: Classical Greek
item.description: So, I’ve signed up for “Greek and Latin Mythology” from U. Penn at coursera.org. It should be an interesting diversion in these times of my doing relatively little. A little Homer, Aristarchus, Thucydides, Aristophanes, Vergil, Ovid and the like would be welcome relief. Read all– or almost all– of these in English translation as a late teenager, and some of the Latin authors in the original. The Greek howeverâ€¦ well, I never got very far with that in High School.

item.title: Rock-Paper-Scissors-Lizard-Spock
